issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: Studio
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Titanium Studio here.

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
Hi Team,

I need to update my Mac system to High Sierra OS. Will I be able to run my appcelerator studio and xcode in High Sierra OS. system details are mentioned below.

Xcode 7.0.1
Appcelerator Studio  VERSION 4.5.0.201602170821 BUILD 201602170821
Titanium SDK 5.2.2
Titanium CLI 5.2.2
npm 2.15.1

Awaiting your reply
fields.summary: Is it possible to run Appcelerator Studio(version 4.5.0.201602170821) in High Sierra Mac OS
fields.environment:
Xcode 7.0.1
Appcelerator Studio  VERSION 4.5.0.201602170821 BUILD 201602170821
Titanium SDK 5.2.2
Titanium CLI 5.2.2
npm 2.15.1

comments.body: Hello, No problem, Feel free to upgrade. Also, you are using an old SDK and also Xcode. Please upgrade to latest ones to avoid troubleshooting. Thanks.

Hello [~ios.admin@investis.com],
Thanks for sharing with us. You can use Appcelerator Studio(version 4.5.0.201602170821) in High Sierra Mac OS. If it creates problem then you can try to use 4.10.

For details pleaae visit [TitaniumCompatibilityMatrix |http://docs.appcelerator.com/platform/latest/#!/guide/Titanium_Compatibility_Matrix-section-src-29004837_TitaniumCompatibilityMatrix-SupportedSDKreleases].

Hope this helps.

Best
